basic.description: A detailed study of selected plays from French theatre since 1945. Visual presentations. Semiotic approach. Cocteau, Duras, Beckett, Ionesco, Sarraute, Sartre, Koltès. Travaux pratiques include tests, an oral presentation and an in-depth essay. Given jointly with FREN 305/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le théâtre depuis 1945

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     FREN212 and FREN220 and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN305; FREN417.
